articles.description: Follow live text updates and BBC Radio 5 Sports Extra commentary from first practice at the Emilia Romagna Grand Prix in Imola.
articles.title: Emilia Romagna Grand Prix first practice - radio and text

articles.description: Over a 16-year professional career, Tyson Fury has risen from small shows and low expectations to a shot at becoming undisputed world champion.
articles.title: Tyson Fury: The rise to Oleksandr Usyk bout and undisputed shot

articles.description: The latest football news as Brazil are selected as 2027 Women's World Cup hosts plus build-up to the final weekend of the Premier League and WSL season.
articles.title: Brazil to host 2027 Women’s World Cup, Leeds reach play-off final plus weekend build-up

articles.description: Listen to BBC local radio commentaries and follow live text coverage from day one of nine games in the County Championship.
articles.title: County Championship: Ben Stokes plays for Durham v Lancashire - scores, radio commentary & updates

articles.description: Barcelona are considering sacking head coach Xavi and replacing him with the club's B team coach Rafael Marquez.
articles.title: Barcelona considering sacking head coach Xavi

articles.description: Liverpool boss Jurgen Klopp says he would vote to scrap video assistant referees because of how the system currently works.
articles.title: Jurgen Klopp: Liverpool boss says he would vote to scrap VAR

articles.description: Former Spain midfielder Thiago Alcantara and Cameroon defender Joel Matip will leave Liverpool at the end of the season.
articles.title: Liverpool: Thiago Alcantara & Joel Matip to leave at end of season

articles.description: Brazil are voted hosts of the 2027 Women's World Cup after beating a joint bid by Belgium, the Netherlands and Germany at Fifa's congress.
articles.title: Women's World Cup: Brazil named hosts of 2027 competition

articles.description: Heavyweight Tyson Fury refuses to face off with Oleksandr Usyk during a cordial news conference in Saudi Arabia.
articles.title: Tyson Fury vs Oleksandr Usyk: Fury won't look Usyk in the eye

articles.description: Cristiano Ronaldo tops the Forbes list of highest-paid athletes for the fourth time in his career, with Jon Rahm moving up to second.
articles.title: Cristiano Ronaldo tops world's highest-paid athlete list - Forbes
